LanguageData.Fluffy.Pharmacist.Tip: Not all wounds are equal; set guidelines for which medicine to use when.
LanguageData.Fluffy.Pharmacist.Settings.Title: Pharmacist settings
LanguageData.Fluffy.Pharmacist.Severity.Minor.Tip: Bruises, non-fatal diseases and small cuts.
LanguageData.Fluffy.Pharmacist.Severity.Major.Tip: Large cuts and potentially fatal diseases.
LanguageData.Fluffy.Pharmacist.Severity.LifeThreathen: Life-threathening wounds, bleeding out and heart attacks.
LanguageData.Fluffy.Pharmacist.Severity.Operation.Tip: All operations, transplants and limb replacements.
